All Classes

Class Description
AutoWiringSpringBeanJobFactory
Auto-wiring support for quartz jobs.
BasicAuth
Spring Security Configuration to authenticate API requests
ControllerConfig
Auto configuration class to overide the default api base url
DefaultExecutorServiceFactory
Executor factory This class is used to create a default executor service
Domain
Class to represent the externally configured accepted email domain names Inputs comes from application.properties in the following prefix: domain
DomainService
Helper service tasks to validate domains for UserService
Favourite
Storage for the voyage favorited by a user
FavouriteController
REST APIs using service methods for Favourite
FavouriteDao
Data Access Objects for "voyage_fav" table to perform various operations
FavouriteService  
HibernateListenerConfigurer
Configuration class to setup DB POST UPDATE Event listening
JobService
Quartz job service Project functional requirement: 1), 2), 3)
LoginDTO
Details input by user at Login
MailService
Service that send email to recipient
NewPasswordDTO
Details input by user at Change and Reset password
PostUpdateEventHandler
Event handler It finds the subbed users and sends them an email on the changes
PropertiesReloader
Class to hot reload properties
QuartzJob
Quartz Job clas.
QuartzProperties
Class to represent the external configuration properties required for scheduling of quartz jobs The Input are from application.properties file and uses the following PREFIX: spring.quartz.properties Consists of getter Consists of getter methods to retrieve the properties This is placed here instead of entity folder to represent the domain usage
QuartzSheduler
Quartz scheduler to control and setup Quartz job
Subscription
Storage for the voyage subscribed by a user
SubscriptionController
REST APIs using service methods for Subscription
SubscriptionDao
Data Access Objects for "voyage_sub" table to perform various operations
SubscriptionDao.UserProjection
Projection helper to support the conversion of result from the native query object to a temporary User entity Naming convention must follow exact name in the entity hence the lack of camel cased letters
SubscriptionService  
UpdateListener
This listener class listens for db update events It will register the event to a thread managed by Executor service The event will then be handled by our custom handler
User
Represents a user account of the application, with the information provided by the user.
UserController
REST APIs using service methods for User
UserDao
Data Access Objects for "user" table to perform various operations
UserService
Service tasks that use DAO methods - retrieve and modify database - useful for REST APIs for User Object
Vessel
An abstraction of a Vessel
VesselController
REST APIs using service methods for Vessel
VesselDao
Data Access Object shared by "vessel" table and "vesselDTO" Used to perform various operations
VesselDTO
DTO Projection helper to support the conversion of result from native query object to a temporary Vessel entity Reference: https://docs.spring.io/spring-data/jpa/docs/current/reference/html/#projections
VesselService
Service tasks that use DAO methods - retrieve and modify database for Vessel Object
VstaApplication
